law.catch_line: The Commission may conduct an investigation in the manner that the Commission finds best to:...

text.section:
The Commission may conduct an investigation in the manner that the Commission finds best to:
determine the substantial rights of each party; and
carry out justly the spirit of this title.

Except as otherwise provided in this title, the Commission is not bound by:
any common law or statutory rule of evidence; or
any formal or technical rule of procedure.
